text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several days after the Japanese<n>Derby...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Okay, Spe. That's it for today's<n>training.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Okay, Spe. That's it for today's<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Whoa, is it that late already?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week's been easily<n>distracted lately. Curious, I look
in the<n>direction she was staring.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... One more!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You're worried about her, aren't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You're worried about her, aren't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. she's working so hard for her<n>next race, and that's
great and all...<n>but...
choice_data_list: She looks like she's being too hard on herself...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? You think so too?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, in all her recent races, she's<n>seemed so...
constrained. I don't think<n>she's having fun out there.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, in all her recent races, she's<n>seemed so...
constrained. I don't think<n>she's having fun out there.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
U-um... Could I stick around for a little<n>longer? I wanna join
Suzuka for her<n>training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Approaching a racer from another<n>team might be
overstepping, but... I'm<n>honestly feeling worried about her<n>
too.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Approaching a racer from another<n>team might be
overstepping, but... I'm<n>honestly feeling worried about her<n>
too.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'll go with you. Come on, let's go.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'll go with you. Come on, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Phew! Thanks for partner running<n>with me!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sorry to bother you out of nowhere.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, it was actually very helpful.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
We may be on different teams, but<n>I'm glad we can still run
together if we<n>happen to stay behind after classes.<n>
Ehehe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Um, Suzuka, do you remember the<n>first time we met? You
know, how I<n>screamed just seeing you run?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
At the time, I was actually really<n>nervous about having left
Hokkaido. I<n>started wondering if I could truly<n>make it here,
to be honest.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Just then, I saw you running with a<n>smile on your face, and
all my fears<n>were blown away! I remember<n>thinking
Tracen must be super fun!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But recently, I've noticed that you...<n>don't smile as much as
before.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I felt the same way at your debut<n>race. You looked so
delighted crossing<n>the finish line. What happened?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I felt the same way at your debut<n>race. You looked so
delighted crossing<n>the finish line. What happened?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I don't understand it myself. I know<n>for a fact that I'm
working hard<n>towards my dream.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And yet, no matter how much I chase<n>after it, my dream
feels further and<n>further away.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've loved running ever since I was<n>little... The sound of my
feet hitting the<n>ground, the wind in my face...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've never forgotten that sensation...<n>Even now, I'm still
chasing it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Special Week, you said I blew you<n>away with my smile, but I
could say<n>the same to you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
You're the one who's facing your<n>dreams head-on. It's like
you're a<n>pure, shining light, whereas I'm... I'm<n>just...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Too much practice can lead to racers<n>being overly hard on
themselves.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But that's also a sign of just how<n>serious she is. If she's
that<n>passionate about running, then there<n>must be some
way to funnel that<n>passion...
choice_data_list: Why don't you try running the way you want to run?
Why don't you try running the way you want to run?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: What... do you mean?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
This probably sounds strange coming<n>from a trainer, but try
running a lap<n>without thinking about winning<n>strategies or
anything else.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
This probably sounds strange coming<n>from a trainer, but try
running a lap<n>without thinking about winning<n>strategies or
anything else.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Forget about pace for once. It's okay<n>if you run out of
stamina partway<n>through. So for now, just run the way<n>
you want.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Can I really do that? Just run the way<n>I want?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, Suzuka! Let's get running! No<n>more thinking, just
whooshing ahead<n>like vwooooom!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right. I'll give it a shot.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(The breeze feels so nice. The sound<n>of my cleats hitting the
ground is so<n>comforting... There's no other sounds<n>to
distract me, no one blocking my line<n>of sight...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (All I'm doing is running, but<n>compared to my races...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (The view before me is so... beautiful.)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Waaah! Suzuka's so fast!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: More. I want to see more.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whoa! She's speeding up even<n>more!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Great running, you two. So, how did<n>that feel?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: S-see for yourself. We're both...<n>absolutely drenched.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You're right, but, well...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I finally saw it. It was only a glimpse...<n>but I saw the scenery
I'm after.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sounds like you really like to run.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Sounds like you really like to run.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Running wild just gave you a glimpse<n>of what you're
running for, right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Running wild just gave you a glimpse<n>of what you're
running for, right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your dream isn't all about victory. If<n>you can find joy in
running, I think<n>you'll start to see it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Your dream isn't all about victory. If<n>you can find joy in
running, I think<n>you'll start to see it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Finding joy... will lead me to my<n>dream?
choice_data_list: Run how you want to run, Suzuka!
Run how you want to run, Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe... All right!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several days later...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Okaaay! Another day of working<n>towards being the best
racer in Japan!<n>We're off to the bamboo grove to<n>collect
as many bamboo shoots as we<n>can!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: How's that supposed to help me?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: H-huh? Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What's up? Your team should be<n>starting their practice
soon.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What's up? Your team should be<n>starting their practice
soon.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I've come to ask for a team transfer.
